import React from 'react'; import { useLanguage } from '../contexts/LanguageContext'; const LanguageTest = () => { const { currentLanguage, changeLanguage, t, translations } = useLanguage(); const languages = [ { code: 'en', name: 'English', flag: 'üá∫üá∏' }, { code: 'zh', name: '‰∏≠Êñá', flag: 'üá®üá≥' }, { code: 'ar', name: 'ÿßŸÑÿπÿ±ÿ®Ÿäÿ©', flag: 'üá∏üá¶' }, { code: 'es', name: 'Espa√±ol', flag: 'üá™üá∏' }, { code: 'ru', name: '–†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π', flag: 'üá∑üá∫' }, { code: 'de', name: 'Deutsch', flag: 'üá©üá™' }, { code: 'fr', name: 'Fran√ßais', flag: 'üá´üá∑' }, { code: 'it', name: 'Italiano', flag: 'üáÆüáπ' }, { code: 'ko', name: 'ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥', flag: 'üá∞üá∑' }, { code: 'ja', name: 'Êó•Êú¨Ë™û', flag: 'üáØüáµ' } ]; return (
